BrowserId.markdownDescription:
The id of the browser.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(aws\.browser\.v1|[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10})$  
Update requires: No interruption

BrowserArn.description: The ARN of a Browser resource.
BrowserArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of a Browser resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:bedrock-agentcore:[a-z0-9-]+:(aws|[0-9]{12}):browser(-custom)?\/(aws\.browser\.v1|[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10})$  
Update requires: No interruption
